short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Link Safer is an extension for the Edge/Chrome browser that allows users to save links and notes securely.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Link Safer - Browser Extension

Link Safer is a secure and convenient browser extension available for Google Chrome and Microsoft Edge. It provides users with a reliable solution to manage saved hyperlinks and notes effectively. By installing this extension, users can enjoy a range of features that enhance their browsing experience. Here's why you should install Link Safer:

1. Manage Saved Links and Notes: Link Safer allows you to easily add, shorten, and open hyperlinks. You can also delete saved items and clear the entire list of links and notes if needed. This extension ensures efficient organization and retrieval of your important online resources.

2. Password Generator: With Link Safer, generating strong and secure passwords becomes effortless. The extension includes a password generator feature that helps you create unique and complex passwords for your online accounts. Say goodbye to weak passwords and enhance your digital security.

3. Customize Addon Logo: Personalize your browsing experience by customizing the addon logo. Link Safer offers a selection of predefined logos to Make the extension reflect your style and preferences.

4. Save and Restore Tabs: Link Safer allows you to save and later restore your currently open tabs. This feature is especially useful for users who frequently work with specific sets of tabs or want to resume their work from a previous session. Save time and effortlessly access your preferred tab configurations.

5. Downloading the List: Users have the option to download their saved links and notes list. This allows them to have a backup of their data or share it with others.
Once installed, you can access Link Safer through your browser's menu. The user-friendly interface provides easy management of your saved links, notes, and passwords. Customize settings and access options by clicking on the extension icon in your browser's toolbar.

We welcome contributions to this project. If you encounter any bugs or have suggestions for improvements, please feel free to contribute by creating a pull request on the extension's GitHub repository.

Link Safer was developed and designed by Â© 2023 S3R43o3 and AI. Install the extension today to securely manage your hyperlinks and notes while enjoying its convenient features.
